name: Ashok Subramanian
recommendations: Senthil Kumar Sankaran “Ashok and I have worked together in Wipro Infrastructure division. Ashok was driving our Networking business and the Network Practice team and contributed significantly to the business. He was known for his detailed business planning and team development. ”

Gangadhar Krishnamoorthy “Ashok comes has unique and successful way of managing client relationship and driving a team to achieve its target. His main strenghts are being compassionate to the customers, driving the organisation internally to reduce the customer pain and motivating his team to achieve the tagets.he is truely capable of driving businesses and alliances in the IT industry independently. he has a remarkable work life balance.”
